bell_schedule.1: School starts at 8 AM. Morning recess is from 10:10 to 10:30AM. For transitional Kindergarden and kindergardeners, lunch is from 11:45 to 12:25. For first and second graders, lunch is from 12:00 to 12:40. For third and fourth grader, lunch is 12:10 to 12:50. For fith grader, lunch is from 12:20pm to 1 PM.  School is dismissed at 2:30 PM.
bell_schedule.2: Early dismissal day. School starts at 8 AM. Morning recess is from 10:10 to 10:30AM. For transitional Kindergarden and kindergardeners, lunch is from 11:45 to 12:25. For first and second graders, lunch is from 12:00 to 12:40. For third and fourth grader, lunch is 12:10 to 12:50. For fith grader, lunch is from 12:20pm to 1 PM. School is dismissed at 1:25 PM.

end_time.2: Early dismissal on Tuesdays. School ends at 1:25 PM
